member.name: T:Roblox.Entities.IEntity`1
member.summary: Provides a common interface for a persisted entity.
member.typeparam: The type of the entity's ID.

member.name: P:Roblox.Entities.IEntity`1.Created
member.summary: Gets the at which the entity was created.
member.value: The at which the entity was created.

member.name: M:Roblox.Entities.IEntity`1.Delete
member.exception: Thrown if the entity no longer exists in persistent storage.

member.name: T:Roblox.Entities.IUpdateableEntity`1
member.summary: Provides a common interface for a persisted entity that can be updated.

member.name: P:Roblox.Entities.IUpdateableEntity`1.Updated
member.summary: Gets the at which the entity was last updated.
member.value: The at which the entity was last updated.

member.name: M:Roblox.Entities.IUpdateableEntity`1.Update
member.summary: Updates the persisted entity to match its current in-memory values.
member.exception: Thrown if the entity no longer exists in persistent storage.
